column5: Enjoy your stay at our Craftsman style home in the historic district of downtown McKinney. Perfect for a long weekend getaway, or an extended stay, you will not be disappointed in your home away from home. We offer an exquisite 3 bed, 2.1 bath home nestled on a quiet street in McKinney, just a short walk to McKinney Square which features over 60 shops and restaurants, live music and weekend farmerâ€™s market! (We also have a queen size blow up mattress to accommodate extra guests.)
column8: Beautiful Crafstman Home near downtown Mckinney
